snippet.title: 『TSURUGIHIME』 teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing a brand new indie game from 213℉,『TSURUGIHIME』

■ What is『TSURUGIHIME』
The last battle is in 100 days and it is up to the player how to live those days.
Built upon the classic genre, side scrolling action RPG, you can "craft" anything from battles, customizing, exploration, story and even your "sister." This is An RPG that "crafts" fate.
This is the first game from the former creative producer of "Fate/Grand Order, Yosuke Shiokawa  since becoming independent. Together with character designer Kuroboshi Kouhaku and composer Takeharu Ishimoto, we are aiming for release on Steam in 2024 with this team.

◆『TSURUGIHIME』Overview◆
Title：TSURUGIHIME
Genre：An RPG that "crafts" fate.
Platform：Steam®
Release Date：Scheduled for 2024
Number of Players：Single Player
Languages：Japanese/English/Simplified Chinese
Developer/Publisher：213℉
Team Member：
Director Yosuke Shiokawa
Character Design Kuroboshi Kouhaku 
Composer Takeharu Ishimoto
Steam Store Page：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2220860/TSURUGIHIME/

*The game is currently under development and subject to change.

 #TSURUGIHIME #Fahrenheit213

---
【Subscribe to the channel】
https://www.youtube.com/@Fahrenheit213

【Stay updated with TSURUGIHIME news here!】
